text: @realDonaldTrump "Can anyone believe" 100's of thousands of Americans are dying and suffering from #coronavirus #COVID19 and the so-called potus has no plan to help us? "Incredible stupidity"! #AmericaOrTrump? #VoteOutHate #TrumpOut2020
